verses.name: Judges 8:4
verses.text: And Gideon came to Jordan, and passed over, he, and the three hundred men that were with him, faint, yet pursuing them.

verses.name: Judges 8:5
verses.text: And he said unto the men of Succoth, Give, I pray you, loaves of bread unto the people that follow me; for they be faint, and I am pursuing after Zebah and Zalmunna, kings of Midian.

verses.name: Judges 8:6
verses.text: And the princes of Succoth said, Are the hands of Zebah and Zalmunna now in thine hand, that we should give bread unto thine army?
